anidbcmdc.util
Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
  anidbcmdc.util.FileUtils

public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Title: FileUtils

Description: A File utility class which provides some advanced functions on files. Like get all files recursive or rename a file or read a file into a String. This class is just a container for static mathods.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

Version:
1.0
Author:
ExElNeT

Method Detail

getFiles

public static java.io.File[] getFiles(java.io.File[] files,
                                      boolean recursive,
                                      boolean regex)
Returns all files in all dirs of files recursively if the flag is set. If files contains files, only matching files will be returned. Regular expressions are allowed.

Parameters:
files - - All files and dirs that should be searched for files.
recursive - - If true, all files and dirs will be searched recursively.
regex - - If true regular expressions are allowed.
Returns:
- A File array of files.

renameFile

public static java.io.File renameFile(java.io.File file,
                                      java.lang.String newFilename,
                                      java.lang.String[] replaceList)
                               throws java.io.IOException
Renames a file to passed name and replaces all Strings in it like described in replaceList.

Parameters:
file - - The file that should be renamed.
newFilename - - The new filename.
replaceList - - A list of replacement instructions. Syntax: ab->ba
Returns:
- The renamed file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - If the File cant be renamed.

readFile

public static java.lang.String readFile(java.io.File file)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Reads a file into a String

Parameters:
file - - The file that should be read into a String.
Returns:
- The interior of the file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - If the file cant be read.
